conclusion: Analyze the scenario of two toy cars moving towards each other on a green surface with colored blocks.
Identify initial positions: A is moving left, B is moving right.
Observe relative positions: toy cars move towards each other, blocks are stationary.
Determine collision point: A and B will collide when closest.
Assess power and deflection: similar power, deflection depends on size and speed.
Predict final positions: A and B will stop at collision point.
Calculate collision distance: distance is sum of initial distances.
Determine final positions: A and B stop at closest point.
Final answer: A and B stop at closest point.
